name: ProfitBricks
overview:
ProfitBricks is a cloud computing company that provides high-end infrastructure as a service (IaaS) for companies and IT professionals.

We offer fast and stable virtual data centers that are based on high standard virtualization technology, which allows you to easily scale your individual infrastructure to fit your needs at any time.

With our Data Center Designer (DCD), a browser based graphical user interface, you can easily add and configure servers, storages, load balancers and firewalls with just one click. Focused on our customers needs, our development team is constantly working on our product to fit all future demands on a fast changing market.

VISION & MISSION As a new provider with a focus on the B2B-market, ProfitBricks sets the bar on offering its customers a low-cost cloud hosting platform based on the newest, high standard virtualization technology.

Our customer’s needs have the highest priority. We offer reliable and flexible infrastructure at transparent and easy to calculate costs. Our customers only pay for what they actually use.

ProfitBricks pays special attention to customer service, utilizing the skills and experience of proficient system administrators. With an absolute commitment to quality of service, we only take new customers if we have sufficient resources to cater for their needs.

In this way, ProfitBricks offers a fast and reliable IT infrastructure with a clear pricing structure and unparalleled customer care standards.
